description: Creates a managed kdb environment for the account.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the kdb environment that you want to create.

parameters.name: kmsKeyId
parameters.description: The KMS key ID to encrypt your data in the FinSpace environment.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs to label the kdb environment. You can add up to 50 tags to your kdb environment. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: environmentArn
nested_items.description: The ARN identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key ID to encrypt your data in the FinSpace environment.

nested_items.name: creationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the kdb environment was created in FinSpace.
